references: Mount, R. H. 1975. The Reptiles and Amphibians of Alabama. Auburn University Agricultural Experiment Station, Auburn, Alabama. vii + 347 pp.
Jung, R. E. 1992. Blanchard's cricket frogs (ACRIS CREPITANS BLANCHARDI) in southwest Wisconsin. Abstract, 6th Annual Meeting of the Society for Conservation Biology, p. 140.
Vogt, R. G. 1981. Natural history of amphibians and reptiles of Wisconsin. Milwaukee Public Museum. 205 pp.
Hammerson, G., G. Santos-Barrera, and D. Church. 2004. Acris crepitans. In: IUCN 2011. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2011.2. <www.iucnredlist.org>.

Martof, B. S., W. M. Palmer, J. R. Bailey, and J. R. Harrison, III. 1980. Amphibians and reptiles of the Carolinas and Virginia. University of North Carolina Press, Chapel Hill, North Carolina. 264 pp.
Green, N. B., and T. K. Pauley. 1987. Amphibians and reptiles in West Virginia. University of Pittsburg Press, Pittsburg, Pennsylvania. xi + 241 pp.
Paloski, R.A., R. Hay, and T.L.E. Bergeson. 2010. Northern cricket frog species guidance. PUB-ER-666. Bureau of Endangered Resources, Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources, Madison, Wisconsin.
Collins, J. T. 1982. Amphibians and reptiles in Kansas. Second edition. Univ. Kansas Mus. Nat. Hist., Pub. Ed. Ser. 8. xiii + 356 pp.

Gamble, T., P.B. Berendzen, H.B. Shaffer, D.E. Starkey, and A.M. Simons. 2008. Species limits and phylogeography of North American cricket frogs (Acris: Hylidae). Molecular Phylogenetics and Evolution, 48:112-125.
Busby, W. 2012. Expert Review for Western Governors Association. Kansas Biological Survey and Kansas Natural Heritage Inventory.
Degenhardt, W., Painter, C., and A. Price.  1996. Amphibians and reptiles of New Mexico. University of New Mexico Press, Albuquerque, New Mexico. 429 pages.
McCullough, R. 2012. Expert Review for Western Governors Association. Natural Heritage New Mexico.

Redmond, W. H., and A. F. Scott. 1996. Atlas of amphibians in Tennessee. The Center for Field Biology, Austin Peay State University, Miscellaneous Publication Number 12. v + 94 pp.
Johnson, Bruce K. and James L. Christiansen. 1976. The food and food habits of Blanchard's cricket frog, Acris crepitans blanchardi (Amphibia, Anura, Hylidae), in Iowa. J. Herpetologica. 10(2):63-74.
Wilson, L. A. 1995. The Land Manager's Guide to the amphibians and reptiles of the South. Chapel Hill, NC: The Nature Conservancy.
Montanucci, R.R. 2006. A Review of the Amphibians of the Jim Timmerman Natural Resources Area, Oconee and Pickens Counties, South Carolina. Southeastern Naturalist, 5:1-58.
habitat_description: A. crepitans inhabits grasslands, meadows, marshes, emergent and floating vegetation, and deciduous woodlands with low canopy cover (Hammerson et al., 2004; Montanucci, 2006; Gamble, 2008; Paloski et al., 2010) in close proximity to standing or slow-moving water (Wilson, 1995; Hammerson et al., 2004).
